scripts.database:clean: mv -t ./ database/.portfoliodb.yaml database/sites.json && rm -r database/ && mkdir database && mv -t database/ sites.json .portfoliodb.yaml
scripts.messages:extract: mv messages/fr.po messages/fr.old.po; cd artifacts/phase_1/en && gettext-extract --output ../../../messages/fr.new.po --startDelimiter '[#' --endDelimiter '#]' *.pug using/*.pug 1> /dev/null
scripts.messages:combine: msgcat --no-location messages/fr.old.po messages/fr.new.po -o messages/fr.po && rm messages/fr.new.po messages/fr.old.po
scripts.pug:build: cd artifacts/phase_1 && cd fr && cp .layout.pug using/.layout.pug && pug . -o ../../phase_2/fr && cd ../en && cp .layout.pug using/.layout.pug && pug . -o ../../phase_2/en
scripts.html:translate: cd translator && poetry run python translate.py && cd ..
scripts.assets:build: echo 'TODO @ assets:build  compress images & others'; cp -r assets/* dist/
scripts.database:update: pnpm database:clean && pnpm database:crawl && pnpm database:build
scripts.prepare:i18n: pnpm pug:hydrate && pnpm messages:extract && pnpm messages:combine
scripts.make: concurrently 'pnpm messages:build' 'pnpm pug:build' && mkdir -p dist/fr dist/en && concurrently 'pnpm html:translate' 'pnpm stylus:build' 'pnpm ls:build' 'pnpm assets:build'
scripts.clean: concurrently 'rm -r artifacts messages/*.mo; exit 0' 'pnpm messages:clean' 'pnpm database:clean'
